alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:41AM CDT until May 15 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL DONIPHAN...NORTHWESTERN LEAVENWORTH...CENTRAL ATCHISON...SOUTHWESTERN BUCHANAN AND NORTHWESTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 640 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atchison to near Lancaster, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Atchison, Rushville, Lancaster, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Farmington, Iatan, Faucett, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi, Lowemont, Cummings and Potter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
